// begin MANDATORY imports (always generated EXACTLY)
import React from 'react';
import { List, Datagrid, TextField, DateField, NumberField, BooleanField } from 'react-admin';
import { ReferenceField, ReferenceManyField } from 'react-admin';
import { TabbedShowLayout, Tab, SimpleShowLayout, TextInput, NumberInput, DateTimeInput } from 'react-admin';
import { ReferenceInput, SelectInput, SimpleForm, Show, Edit, Create } from 'react-admin';
import { EditButton, DeleteButton, CreateButton } from 'react-admin';
import { Filter, Pagination } from 'react-admin';
import { Grid, Typography, Box, Divider, Button } from '@mui/material';
import { useRecordContext, useRedirect } from 'react-admin';
import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add';
// end mandatory imports

// Filter for Response List
const ResponseFilter = (props) => (
    <Filter {...props}>
        <TextInput label="Search by ID" source="id" alwaysOn />
        <DateTimeInput source="response_date" label="Response Date" />
    </Filter>
);

// Response List
export const ResponseList = (props) => {
    return (
        <List filters={<ResponseFilter />} {...props} sort={{ field: 'id', order: 'ASC' }} pagination={<Pagination rowsPerPageOptions={[5, 10, 25]} showFirstLastButtons />}>
            <Datagrid rowClick="show">
                <TextField source="id" label="ID" />
                <ReferenceField source="card_id" reference="CardSelection">
                    <TextField source="id" />
                </ReferenceField>
                <ReferenceField source="user_id" reference="User">
                    <TextField source="name" />
                </ReferenceField>
                <DateField source="response_date" label="Response Date" />
                <TextField source="response_text" label="Response Text" />
                <BooleanField source="response_bool" label="Response Bool" />
                <NumberField source="response_range" label="Response Range" />
                <EditButton />
                <DeleteButton />
            </Datagrid>
        </List>
    );
};

// Response Show
export const ResponseShow = (props) => {
    return (
        <Show {...props}>
            <SimpleShowLayout>
                <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                    <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" sx={{ mb: 2, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                        Response Information
                    </Typography>
                    <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <Labeled label="ID">
                                    <TextField source="id" />
                                </Labeled>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <Labeled label="Response Date">
                                    <DateField source="response_date" />
                                </Labeled>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <Labeled label="Response Text">
                                    <TextField source="response_text" />
                                </Labeled>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                    <Divider sx={{ my: 2 }} />
                </Box>
            </SimpleShowLayout>
            <TabbedShowLayout>
                <Tab label="Card Selection">
                    <ReferenceManyField reference="CardSelection" target="card_id" addLabel={false} pagination={<Pagination />}>
                        <Datagrid rowClick="show">
                            <TextField source="id" label="ID" />
                            <EditButton />
                            <DeleteButton />
                        </Datagrid>
                    </ReferenceManyField>
                </Tab>
                <Tab label="User Responses">
                    <ReferenceManyField reference="User" target="user_id" addLabel={false} pagination={<Pagination />}>
                        <Datagrid rowClick="show">
                            <TextField source="id" label="ID" />
                            <EditButton />
                            <DeleteButton />
                        </Datagrid>
                    </ReferenceManyField>
                </Tab>
            </TabbedShowLayout>
        </Show>
    );
};

// Response Create
export const ResponseCreate = (props) => {
    return (
        <Create {...props}>
            <SimpleForm>
                <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                    <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" sx={{ mb: 2, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                        Create New Response
                    </Typography>
                    <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <TextInput source="response_text" label="Response Text" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <BooleanInput source="response_bool" label="Response Bool" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <NumberInput source="response_range" label="Response Range" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <ReferenceInput source="card_id" reference="CardSelection" fullWidth>
                                    <SelectInput optionText="id" validate={required()} />
                                </ReferenceInput>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <ReferenceInput source="user_id" reference="User" fullWidth>
                                    <SelectInput optionText="name" validate={required()} />
                                </ReferenceInput>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <DateTimeInput source="response_date" label="Response Date" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                </Box>
            </SimpleForm>
        </Create>
    );
};

// Response Edit
export const ResponseEdit = (props) => {
    return (
        <Edit {...props} redirect={false}>
            <SimpleForm>
                <Box sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                    <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" sx={{ mb: 2, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                        Edit Response
                    </Typography>
                    <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <TextInput source="response_text" label="Response Text" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <BooleanInput source="response_bool" label="Response Bool" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <NumberInput source="response_range" label="Response Range" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <ReferenceInput source="card_id" reference="CardSelection" fullWidth>
                                    <SelectInput optionText="id" validate={required()} />
                                </ReferenceInput>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <ReferenceInput source="user_id" reference="User" fullWidth>
                                    <SelectInput optionText="name" validate={required()} />
                                </ReferenceInput>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                            <Box sx={{ p: 1 }}>
                                <DateTimeInput source="response_date" label="Response Date" fullWidth />
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                </Box>
            </SimpleForm>
        </Edit>
    );
};

export default {
    list: ResponseList,
    show: ResponseShow,
    create: ResponseCreate,
    edit: ResponseEdit,
};
